name: Don't Pop The Balloon (Roasty_McToasty)
description:
Made for Weekly Game Jam - Week 215

If the browser version does not work/load, try the downloadable version.

For 2-4 players.

Each player takes their turn by blowing up a balloon 1-3 times, and the player that pops the balloon is the loser!

Available as browser version on WebGL or downloadable executable for Windows.

Code work by: Roasty_McToasty!      Sprite work by: RadishCreature!

Background music by Alexander Nakarada @ chosic.com!

Le Baguette by Alexander Nakarada | https://www.serpentsoundstudios.com

Music promoted on https://www.chosic.com/
